subject: Inquiry about Reservations
content: I would like to know if you have any availability for 4 people this weekend.

subject: Feedback on Last Visit
content: I wanted to let you know that the service last night was exceptional. Thank you!

subject: Complaint about Food Quality
content: The food quality during my last visit was below expectations. Please address this issue.

subject: Event Booking Request
content: I am interested in booking your venue for a private event. Can you share the details?

subject: Question about Menu Items
content: Do you have gluten-free options available on your menu?
